title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not persisted between sessions in the workbench. As a result, when the workbench is restarted, the MRU list is empty.
OB: When the workbench is restarted after shutting it down, the MRU file list is not displayed. It shows an empty list instead.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions. When the workbench is restarted, the same files that were open before shutting down should be displayed in the MRU file list.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench. 5. Verify that the MRU file list is empty instead of displaying the previously opened files.
